short_summary: Request for Information - Marine Fleet Greening
description: Natural Resources Canada is seeking information on marine fleet greening
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
====================================
### Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) seeks information on marine fleet greening.

**Title**: CANADIAN COAST GUARD – MARINE VESSEL FLEET GREENING

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01015985

**Publication Date**: 2022-12-05
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-01-16T13:00:00 (Expired)

**Introduction**
---------------

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites industry stakeholders to provide input on practical guidance and viable options for reducing greenhouse gas emissions from the Canadian Coast Guard's marine fleet.

**Objective**
-------------

The primary objective of this Request for Information (RFI) is to seek input from industry experts on feasible solutions to decrease greenhouse gas emissions from the Canadian Coast Guard's marine vessels.

**Scope**
---------

This RFI focuses on researching marine fleet greening options that can contribute to reducing emissions within the Canadian Coast Guard's fleet.

**Contact Information**
--------------------

*   Name: Serge Tshimanga
*   Email: [Serge.Tshimanga@rncan-nrcan.gc.ca](mailto:Serge.Tshimanga@rncan-nrcan.gc.ca)

**Attachments**
--------------

To review the RFI document and supporting files, please see the following links:

*   [rfi_-_nrcan-174590.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/05/a4b69913aee67b6e4dabaf1fdffa6e64/rfi_-_nrcan-174590.pdf)
*   [annex_b_-_operational_data.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/05/4f8dd044b5068a33243af5ceb33429d2/annex_b_-_operational_data.pdf)
*   [nrcan_part_5-answer_form_rfi_nrcan-174590.xlsx](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/05/748b29d0ea4cce2bb0192320749a937c/nrcan_part_5-answer_form_rfi_nrcan-174590.xlsx) 
(Note that links provided seems to just be an extract from original content.)

**Initial Requirements for Significant Disruption**
--------------------------------------------------

NRCan intends to consider industry
